item.title: E3 marketing - Upwork
item.description:
### Marketing Operations Manager Report for entr3pnr.com and shop.entr3pnr.com

**Report Date:** June 23, 2024  
**Prepared By:** [Your Name], Marketing Operations Manager

#### Executive Summary
This report outlines the deliverables for the content schedule across three main segments: Entr3pod (podcast), Entr3pnr LLC vlogs, and EZB POP UP$. The goal is to enhance brand visibility, engage our audience, and drive traffic to both our main site (entr3pnr.com) and our e-commerce platform (shop.entr3pnr.com).

---

### 1. Entr3pod

**Objective:** Increase podcast listenership and engagement through strategic content planning and cross-promotion on various platforms.

**Content Schedule:**

- **Weekly Episodes:**
  - **Release Day:** Every Monday
  - **Format:** 45-minute episodes featuring interviews with successful entrepreneurs, business strategies, and industry insights.
  - **Guests:** Schedule and confirm guests at least 4 weeks in advance.

- **Promotion:**
  - **Social Media Teasers:** Short clips and quotes from the episodes to be shared on Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook every Tuesday and Thursday.
  - **Blog Posts:** Detailed show notes and additional resources related to each episode to be published on the website every Wednesday.
  - **Email Newsletter:** Highlight key episodes and upcoming guests in the bi-weekly newsletter.

**Deliverables:**
  - Confirm guests and recording schedule.
  - Edit and finalize episodes one week before release.
  - Create promotional content (audiograms, quotes, images).
  - Schedule social media posts and blog entries.
  - Track and analyze listener engagement and feedback.

---

### 2. Entr3pnr LLC Vlogs

**Objective:** Showcase behind-the-scenes activities, business insights, and personal stories to build a deeper connection with our audience.

**Content Schedule:**

- **Bi-Weekly Vlogs:**
  - **Release Day:** Every other Wednesday
  - **Format:** 10-15 minute videos covering various topics such as day-in-the-life segments, project highlights, and business tips.
  - **Filming Schedule:** Plan and shoot content at least two weeks in advance.

- **Promotion:**
  - **YouTube Channel:** Optimize video titles, descriptions, and tags for SEO.
  - **Social Media:** Share highlights and snippets on Instagram Stories, Reels, TikTok, and LinkedIn every Thursday.
  - **Blog Integration:** Embed vlogs in relevant blog posts on entr3pnr.com to drive traffic and provide additional context.

**Deliverables:**
  - Plan and storyboard vlog content.
  - Coordinate filming and editing schedules.
  - Develop promotional materials and schedule posts.
  - Monitor video performance and audience feedback.

---

### 3. EZB POP UP$

**Objective:** Promote and drive attendance to EZB POP UP$ events, highlighting unique selling points and experiences offered at each event.

**Content Schedule:**

- **Event Announcements:**
  - **Frequency:** Announce events at least one month in advance with reminders leading up to the event date.
  - **Channels:** Website banners, email blasts, and social media posts.

- **Event Highlights:**
  - **Pre-Event:** Teasers showcasing vendors, products, and exclusive offers.
  - **During Event:** Live coverage through Instagram Live, Stories, and Facebook Live to engage remote audiences.
  - **Post-Event:** Recap videos and photo galleries to be shared within one week after the event.

**Promotion:**
  - **Email Campaigns:** Dedicated emails highlighting event details, RSVP links, and exclusive offers.
  - **Social Media Countdown:** Daily posts featuring different aspects of the event (e.g., vendor spotlights, special activities) starting two weeks prior.
  - **Partnerships:** Collaborate with local influencers and businesses to expand reach.

**Deliverables:**
  - Coordinate with event planners and vendors.
  - Create and distribute promotional content.
  - Schedule and execute live event coverage.
  - Collect and share post-event media.

---

### Summary of Next Steps

1. **Entr3pod:**
   - Finalize guest list and recording schedule for the next 4 episodes.
   - Begin editing upcoming episodes.
   - Develop promotional content for the next 2 episodes.

2. **Entr3pnr LLC Vlogs:**
   - Plan and shoot the next two vlog episodes.
   - Start editing the footage and creating social media snippets.

3. **EZB POP UP$:**
   - Coordinate with vendors and finalize event details for the next pop-up.
   - Begin the promotional campaign, focusing on social media and email marketing.

**Performance Metrics to Track:**
- Podcast download and listener numbers.
- Vlog views, likes, comments, and shares.
- Event attendance and engagement rates.
- Website traffic and conversion rates from content-driven visitors.

By adhering to this content schedule and ensuring timely and high-quality deliverables, we aim to increase audience engagement, brand loyalty, and overall sales on our platforms.

**Prepared by:**

[Your Name]  
Marketing Operations Manager  
entr3pnr.com | shop.entr3pnr.com

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 23, 2024 22:09 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Marketing Strategy
Skills: Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

**Prepared by:**

Marketing Operations Manager  
entr3pnr.com | shop.entr3pnr.com

Budget: $5

item.title: Simple edit cut - Upwork
item.description:
Hey! This is is a very simple job I don’t need any edits whatsoever all I need you to do is cut out any bits where I hesitate stutter or there are gaps. It won’t take you less than an hour  it’s a 25 minute video. I will also give you a separate recording In a file so you’ll need to match that with the video. Only apply if you’ve got previous experience.

$10 fixed

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 23, 2024 21:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Photo Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Video Editing, Photo Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for a Faceless Youtube Channel: Car Niche - Upwork
item.description:
JOB POSTING
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create entertaining and informative videos for our faceless YouTube automation channel.

We are looking for MULTIPLE talented, hard-working, and experienced people to fill this role!

Our channel focuses on American Car topics from modern cars to vintage cars. Below are three similar videos for reference. If you can create similar videos of better quality, then let's get started!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5vBcefbqgLc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rl5n2cpmaYg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qOWi7lcUErs

WE ARE LOOKING FOR A LONG-TERM COLLABORATION!

We will pay each candidate on a project-basis in the beginning and then eventually transition into a FULL-TIME, WELL PAID RETAINER if the candidate is a good fit for our company's ambitious goals!

Please do not apply if you do not have any experience.

Looking forward to working with you!

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 23, 2024 21:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: PHL
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a creative video editor for a short story - Upwork
item.description:
I'm in search of an exceptional video editor  adept at crafting short, humorous stories similar to the style showcased in this example: [Example Video Link](https://youtu.be/jc3vulOUtcw?si=f1rFDcY-7LGxNS1-).

**Responsibilities:**
- Develop scenes voice and sfx
- Deliver 5 to 7 stories each week, with the potential for more if possible.

**Requirements:**
- Please provide your rate per story, as this is intended to be a long-term collaboration.
- Submit examples of your previous work, or feel free to create a new sample story as a demonstration of your capabilities.

**Eligibility Criteria:**
- Include relevant samples with your application.
- Must have a job success rate

I look forward to reviewing your submissions and exploring a potential collaboration.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 23, 2024 21:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video creator / Video production - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video creator for my YouTube videos, videos need to be elegible for monetization, I'm paying $10 per video.  This includes scrypt, Voice over, editing the video and thumbnail. My niche is about 25 facts about a random topic. I'm attaching an example, videos are 3-4 minutes long.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 23, 2024 21:31 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing
Country: Mexico
